mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no }
update board set title=#{title }, content=#{content } where no=#{no }
mapper.select: select t.no, t.title, t.name as userName, t.user_no as userNo, t.hit, t.reg_date as regDate, t.group_no as groupNo, t.order_no as orderNo, t.depth, t.rownum from (select c.no, c.title, c.name, c.user_no, c.hit, c.reg_date, c.group_no, c.order_no, c.depth, @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rownum from (select b.no, b.title, a.name, b.user_no, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.group_no, b.order_no, b.depth from user a, board b, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) r where a.no=b.user_no order by b.group_no asc, b.order_no desc) c order by rownum desc) t where t.rownum between #{startNo } and #{endNo}
select title, content, user_no as userNo, order_no as orderNo, group_no as groupNo, depth from board where no=#{no }
mapper.update: update board set order_no=order_no+1 where group_no=#{groupNo } and order_no>=#{orderNo }
